typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MANDT as string,
		CARRID as string,
		CONNID as string,
		FLDATE as string,
		BOOKID as string,
		CUSTOMID as string,
		CUSTTYPE as string,
		SMOKER as string,
		LUGGWEIGHT as string,
		WUNIT as string,
		INVOICE as string,
		CLASS as string,
		FORCURAM as string,
		FORCURKEY as string,
		LOCCURAM as integer,
		LOCCURKEY as string,
		ORDER_DATE as string,
		COUNTER as string,
		AGENCYNUM as string,
		CANCELLED as string,
		RESERVED as string,
		PASSNAME as string,
		PASSFORM as string,
		PASSBIRTH as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Booking
source(output(
		MANDT as string,
		ID as string,
		NAME as string,
		FORM as string,
		STREET as string,
		POSTBOX as string,
		POSTCODE as string,
		CITY as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		REGION as string,
		TELEPHONE as string,
		CUSTTYPE as string,
		DISCOUNT as string,
		LANGU as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		WEBUSER as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Customer
source(output(
		MANDT as string,
		CARRID as string,
		CONNID as string,
		FLDATE as string,
		PRICE as string,
		CURRENCY as string,
		PLANETYPE as string,
		SEATSMAX as string,
		SEATSOCC as string,
		PAYMENTSUM as string,
		SEATSMAX_B as string,
		SEATSOCC_B as string,
		SEATSMAX_F as string,
		SEATSOCC_F as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Flight
Booking, Customer join(CUSTOMID == ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 aggregate(groupBy(CITY),
	LOCCURAM = sum(LOCCURAM),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
